snippet: A law firm said it had dropped the effort to collect $710 from Tamon Robinson, who was hit in April.
abstract: Law firm formally drops effort to collect $710 from Tamon Robinson for repairs to a New York City police car that was damaged after a chase that ended when it collided with Robinson and killed him; Police Dept spokesman says that the agency did not send the letter, which was brought to their attention by Robinson's family.
lead_paragraph: A law firm said it had dropped the effort to collect $710 from Tamon Robinson, who was hit in April.

headline.seo: Tamon Robinson Billed for Damage to Police Car That Hit and Killed Him
headline.main: City Tried to Bill Dead Man for Damage to Police Car That Struck and Killed Him
headline.print_headline: City Tried to Bill Dead Man for Damage To Police Car That Struck and Killed Him
